name: Cowboy Life Demo
detailed_description:
Cowboy Life is a game about the life of western town and its inhabitants. This place has many stories to tell about.

Demo features a preview of first level area and start of the story.
about_the_game:
Cowboy Life is a game about the life of western town and its inhabitants. This place has many stories to tell about.

Demo features a preview of first level area and start of the story.
short_description: Cowboy Life is a game about the life of western town and its inhabitants. This place has many stories to tell about. Demo features a preview of first level area and start of the story.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (SP3) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 a 2.0 Ghz, AMD Athlon XP o procesador equivalente
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Penryn) 2.53 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 4500MHD or equivalent
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
